revised_title: Investigation of the Chemical Reaction Between Hydrogen Chloride and Potassium Chlorate
tldr: This study investigates the chemical reaction between hydrogen chloride and potassium chlorate, focusing on the rate of decomposition and the effect of varying the concentrations of the reactants. The results show that the rate of decomposition is influenced by the amount of chlorate, hydrogen chloride, potassium chloride, and potassium iodide present, as well as temperature.
